sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { data: '' } componentWillReceiveProps(nextProps, nextContext) { this.setState({id: nextProps.currentId}) } componentDidUpdate() { axios.get(`https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/video/${this.state.id}`) .then((response) => { this.setState({data: response.data}) }) if(this.state.id == this.props.match.params.vid) { return false } } render() { console.log(this.state.data) return (
